pageContext.claim: “To cut off the supply of ultra-lethal narcotics at the source, my administration has also prioritized stopping the influx of fentanyl from China. And just over the last week, I want to thank Mexico, the Mexican government, their great President of Mexico, for helping us. They had a record catch a week ago of fentanyl that came in from China.”
pageContext.analysis: The largest seizure of fentanyl ever was on Jan. 31, 2019 — not in late August, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection.
